title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: ADO A20F XE Fat Tire E-bike - 250W Foldable
text:
ADO 20F XE electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system - The latest XE model
Shimano 7-speed TransmissionADO 20F XE  electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system, it can effectively solve the problems customers encounter on hills, snow and other difficult roads. Give customers a smooth sporting experience!
Front fork suspension to overcome rough and bumpy road conditions The front fork is with spring absorber ,which effectively absorbs the ground impact and brings sensitive response and smooth operation to the rider.
20X4.0 Fat TyreFolding electric bike looks much like any other foldable mountain bike, but with some extra style and those 20×4.0 CST fat tires have an attitude.
It combines the best of both foldable bikes and mountain bikes you can get.
Overall size : 1740*530*1200 mm
After folding: 980*450*770 mm
Net Weight: 30kgG-Driver 2.0 Control SystemADO’s updated G-Driver controller is the solution to gear automation. It offers excellent real-time performance and responds seamlessly to user input.


250w Powerful MotorThis 20-inch fat-tire electric bike packs some awesome power in the form of a massive 250-watt rear hub motor that works with a 36V 10.4Ah battery for a maximum speed of 25 miles per hour. The high-speed motor allows you to cross any terrain with ease.
location: Buh rein, Northern Suburbs, Western Cape

title: Giant Trance Full Carbon 26inch - Vrey good condition
text:
I only rode this bicycle for a few months when I was first learning. It is full carbon with great travel 180mm in the front and Maestro 4 back suspension. 

The bicycle is an incredibly l Iight, nimble 26inch that will provide everything you need and more. 

Brand new XT cassette fitted with less than 100km done in it. Good tires and recently serviced. 

It's a must see   as it truly is eye catching even all these years later. 

Top of the range in it day and still a great option for any trails.
location: Devils Peak, Cape Town, Western Cape

title: Giant Anthem Aluxx SL fluid from 29inch with Mavic rims - brilliant condition
text:
This was the bike that got me into riding, an absolute dream machine. 
Unfortunately it is actually a bit big for me and so I am selling as I just got a small frame bicycle upgrade. 

This bike is incredly light with Mavic aftermarket rims fitted. Brand new Schwabel Tyre on the back and 6 month old Maxxis on the front. 
Recent full suspension service done at stoked suspension and Lynne Dropper fitted less than 12 months ago. 

This is a Medium Frame 29inch with all XT parts and float suspension. Top of the range in its day, with lots of life left to give and should not require any money being spent on it for some time. 

Great bang for your buck and a perfect entry weapon to MTB.
location: Devils Peak, Cape Town, Western Cape

title: 19" Giant Boulder Mountain Bike plus accesories
text:
This 12speed Mountain bike is in good, working condition! Its a 19inch frame so good for someone between around 1.78m - 1.85m.
It comes with a hand pump that fits nicely on the frame, a helmet which is size large, a used polar waterbottle and a little carry bag with a puncture kit and some tube glue inside.
It doesnt have any lights or a kickstand.
The breaks work well, I replaced one of the tubes with a brand new one and the gears shift lovely. It also has a beautiful sounding bell!
I stay in Milnerton. Feel free to WhatsApp me on 0640880375
Selling the bike and all the accessories for only R2300!

title: Specialized Stumpjumper FSR Expert Carbon 29
text: Selling my size medium 2016 Specialized Stumpjumper FSR Expert Carbon 29 trail bike. In great condition and well looked after. The bike has 150mm front suspension and 130mm rear suspension.The fork has just had a full service done at the end of June, the rear shock has also been recently serviced. A brand new cassette, chain and chainring have just been fitted and never used. The headset bearings were replaced at the same time as the fork service and the rest of the bearings have also been replaced recently. The brakes have also had a full service recently. Front and rear tyres are still in very good condition.The bike came with Dt Swiss hubs which I upgraded to Lyne Components hubs, a JB01 front hub and a JB03 rear hub. title: 2017 Giant Anthem 2 Mountain Bike
text:
2017, Giant Anthem 2, a nimble ride that's a blast to weave through tricky lines or whip around turns


The Anthem 2 is a fun and flickable 110mm, 27.5-inch offering from Giant. This nimble steed rips through corners and hunts down every site hit. It bunny hops and manuals at will and speedy acceleration adds to the fun. These antics combine with solid downhill and superior climbing performance to make for a solid, straightforward trail option. A few testers experience a suspiciously high number of pedal strikes aboard this bike. Other notable drawbacks are a less than ideal tire and rim width and an outdated cockpit setup with a long stem and narrower bars. Still, this bike is outfitted with an impressive value to performance ratio thanks to its spectacular build kit. The Giant sports Fox suspension, a Shimano SLX 1x11 drivetrain, Shimano Deore M615 brakes and a Giant Contact SL Switch dropper post. 
The Anthem is a fantastic option if you're more comfortable with smaller wheels and prefer a quick, responsive ride. This bike is well-equipped out of the box, is capable on a wide variety of terrain, and excels in tighter, more technical trails.

-Tyres in good condition (rear is newer)
-Aluminum alloy Schwinn saddlepost, stem, Handlebars and clamp
-Schwinn saddle and aftermarket ergo grippers

title: Raleigh M650 Dual Suspension 18-Speed Mountain Bike
text: Kindly read the entire description and view all the pictures before making contact. Swipe from one picture to the next, tap on picture for full view and pinch-zoom for greater detail.Unit pictured is the exact one that you're getting. Nothing more, nothing less. If it's not in the pictures, it's not there.Take your time to check through the pictures. I've tried to represent the product as honestly and completely as possible. I do my best to be your eyes when taking the pictures.Item used and will need some TLC to get mobile, but if you're handy with these things it shouldn't cost you too much before you're heading for the hills.Don't buy if you don't know what it is or can do! I can't offer you technical backup; you buy as-is.Why not make me an offer on it? You may well be better off for it? Collection from Alberton ONLY! (Couriers welcome too, but only after your funds have cleared).We chat on this platform only, so don't ask for WhatsApp/Wharrawharra. It'll prevent me from confusing you with somebody else and is also the recommended thing to do, for both your safety and mine. I've got the App on my cell phone, so will not be too far away to reply to you.
